languages.text: "Эти мрази с дубинками совсем озверели. Слышали, они снова сожгли двадцать наших вместе с хибарами!"
"Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"
languages.original_text: "Эти мрази с дубинками совсем озверели. Слышали, они снова сожгли двадцать наших вместе с хибарами!"

traits.locale_text: "Those mace-wielding bastards are completely off their rocker. Have you heard the news? Another twenty of our folks torched along with their shacks!"
"Those mace-wielding bastards are completely off their rocker. Have you heard the news? Another twenty of our folks torched along with their shacks!"
"Those baton-wielding bastards have gone completely mad. Have you heard the news? Another twenty of our people torched along with their shacks!"
"Those baton-wielding bastards have gone completely mad. Have you heard the news? Another twenty of our people torched along with their shacks!"
"Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"
"Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"

languages.text: «Esos capullos con porra han perdido la cabeza. ¡Han calcinado a otra veintena de los nuestros en sus casas!».
languages.original_text: "Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"

traits.locale_text: «Esos capullos con porra han perdido la cabeza. ¡Han calcinado a otra veintena de los nuestros en sus casas!».

languages.text: 「あのバトンを振り回す外道ども、頭に血が上ってやがる！また20人も小屋ごと燃やされた！」
languages.original_text: "Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"

traits.locale_text: 「あのバトンを振り回す外道ども、頭に血が上ってやがる！また20人も小屋ごと燃やされた！」

languages.text: “那些拿着警棍的家伙已经彻底疯了。他们又烧了一大堆棚屋，还连带着烧死了二十来个人！”
languages.original_text: "Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"

traits.locale_text: “那些拿着警棍的家伙已经彻底疯了。他们又烧了一大堆棚屋，还连带着烧死了二十来个人！”

languages.text: "Diese Mistkerle mit ihren Stöcken sind völlig verrückt geworden. Schon wieder wurden zwanzig unserer Leute zusammen mit ihren Hütten verbrannt!"
languages.original_text: "Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Mistkerle mit ihren Stöcken sind völlig verrückt geworden. Schon wieder wurden zwanzig unserer Leute zusammen mit ihren Hütten verbrannt!"

languages.text: « Ces salauds ont pété les plombs, avec leurs matraques. Ils ont encore brûlé vingt des nôtres avec leurs cabanes ! »
languages.original_text: "Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"

traits.locale_text: « Ces salauds ont pété les plombs, avec leurs matraques. Ils ont encore brûlé vingt des nôtres avec leurs cabanes ! »

languages.text: "Coplarını kuşanmış şu şerefsizlerin gözleri iyice dönmüş. Aramızdan yirmi kişi daha barakalarıyla birlikte küle döndü!"
languages.original_text: "Those baton-wielding bastards have gone bleeding mad. Another twenty of our folk torched along with their shacks!"
